title: Lynda - Making Money with VRBO

Subject: Business 
Software: VRBO 
Author: Christopher Matthew Spencer 
 
Boost your income by renting out a spare roomâ€”or transitioning a second home to a short-term rentalâ€”with VRBO. This detailed course will help new hosts succeed on VRBO, the rental site with more than 1 million listings worldwide.â€¨â€¨Christopher Matthew Spencer, a successful VRBO host, first acquaints viewers with VRBO and the requirementsâ€”both in terms of mindset and propertyâ€”needed to venture into the VRBO world. Then you'll learn how to prep a property, stock it with amenities that will garner 5-star reviews, and craft an attention-getting listing that covers everything from the listing headline to property descriptions and guides. The course also explores how to manage guest interactions, deal with housekeeping and maintenance, and promote listings outside of VRBO. Start watching to learn how you can profit from this great sharing economy platform.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Evaluating whether VRBO is right for you
	â€¢	Writing about and photographing the property
	â€¢	Establishing a price for your VRBO rental
	â€¢	Planning for ongoing maintenance
	â€¢	Preparing the kitchen, bedroom(s), and other spaces
	â€¢	Stocking your rental with amenities
	â€¢	Scouting the competition
	â€¢	Managing guest interactions, including check-in and checkout
	â€¢	Working with guest feedback
	â€¢	Promoting your VRBO rental
